characterDescription:
Nomad is Brandon's lead character in The Sunlit Man, his fourth Secret Project announced on YouTube on 3/30/22.
Nomad at one point held a Dawnshard but no longer does.
That said, Nomad can feed upon Investiture, so he could overtake that threshold in the right circumstances. But not currently. Currently he can't even get himself Connected to the planet upon which he is to speak the language there.

characterDetails.Characteristics:
Nomad exaggerates that perhaps billions of people die every day in the cosmere.*
Nomad mentions a story of a war between his ancestors and the Alethi people, referenced to be "giants from the east," and that the Alethi claimed to go up to the heavens, "where Yaezir himself sits upon his throne." This is a likely nod to his heritage of being Makabaki or at least a member of the Azish empire (since it already is mentioned he lived in the mountains and has dark skin like the Makabaki people). It is also likely this is a reference to the historical genocide by the Alethi warlord Sunmaker.
He's been set upon by a Torment.
characterDetails.Notes: *Brandon has said that he does so because he's Hoid's apprentice and has dramatic license and hyperbole as a tool that he can use at will. Further, that he has no idea how many people actually die and although he could run the math, he has not run that math.
